text: King Of The Nerds returns to TVs this

ultimate nerd title but only one will
take the
crown could it be
Ben hi I'm Ben I'm 29 I'm a scientist at
the University of Southern California I
study deep sea microbiology obviously
I'm going to save the world studying
deep SE
microbiology I'm an all-around nerd so

I don't think I have nerd special powers
